name: Mini Chimeras
description:
The game where you can take random parts from enemy to make yourself powerful against them (or weaker).

Learn strengths and weaknesses of each element and their synergy to build your ultimate imbalanced chimera.

Made in 2 weeks for LOWREZJAM 2021

Source Code

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Mouse Button - primary attack with your arms

Right Mouse Button - use the skill given by your current head

1-5 number buttons - change screen scale

Credits:

Game by @saviorium and @Sasha9889

Libraries used:

  • LÖVE 11.3
  • hump, peachy, baton, HC, Clipper library and Lua bindings, STI
  • Sounds from freesound.org
